com.ibm.jaggr.service.cache
Interface ICacheManager.CreateCompletionCallback

Enclosing interface:
ICacheManager
public static interface ICacheManager.CreateCompletionCallback

Interface used to provide a file creation callback. Instances of this class are specified when calling ICacheManager.createCacheFileAsync(String, InputStream, CreateCompletionCallback) and ICacheManager.createCacheFileAsync(String, Reader, CreateCompletionCallback) .

Method Summary
 void completed(String filename, Exception e)
          This method is called when a cache file has been created or an exception occurred while trying to creat it.
 

Method Detail

completed

void completed(String filename,
               Exception e)
This method is called when a cache file has been created or an exception occurred while trying to creat it.

Parameters:
filename - The file name of the cache file, not including path information, or null if an exception occurred. The file is located in the directory specified by ICacheManager.getCacheDir().
e - The exception object if an exception occurred while trying to create the file, or null if the file was successfully created.
